Instruction: In a medium bowl, combine vinegar, black pepper, and red pepper flakes.

Heat oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add sesame seeds and lower the heat to medium. Cook until the seeds turn brown, about 5 minutes. Use a slotted spoon to remove the seeds and mix them into the vinegar mixture. Add cucumber, green onions, and carrot, then cover and refrigerate for at least 5 minutes.
